verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> then cause her to <S%H3045>know<s%> all her <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> A <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H6256>her,<s%> that her time may <S%H935>come,<s%> and that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%> against herself to defile <S%H2930>her!<s%>

You have become <S%H816>guilty<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood<s%> that you have <S%H8210>shed,<s%> and are <S%H2930>defiled<s%> in your <S%H1544>idols<s%> which you have <S%H6213>made;<s%> and you have caused your <S%H3117>days<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> and have <S%H935>come<s%> even to your <S%H8141>years:<s%> therefore have I <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and a <S%H7048>mocking<s%> to all the <S%H776>countries.<s%>
Those who are <S%H7138>near,<s%> and those who are <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H7046>you,<s%> shall mock <S%H2931>you,<s%> you infamous one and <S%H7227>full<s%> of <S%H4103>tumult.<s%>
<S%H5387>Behold,<s%> the princes of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> according to his <S%H2220>power,<s%> have been in you to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

In you have they set <S%H7043>light<s%> by <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother;<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you have they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression<s%> with the <S%H1616>foreigner;<s%> in you have they <S%H3238>wronged<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H490>widow.<s%>
You have <S%H959>despised<s%> my holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths.<s%>

<S%H7400>Slanderous<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> have been in you to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and in you they have <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>
In you have they <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> in you have they <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her who was <S%H5079>unclean<s%> in her <S%H2931>impurity.<s%>

<S%H376>One<s%> has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife;<s%> and <S%H376>another<s%> has <S%H2154>lewdly<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law; and <S%H376>another<s%> in you has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

In you have they <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7810>bribes<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> and <S%H8636>increase,<s%> and you have greedily <S%H1214>gained<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H5221>Behold,<s%> therefore, I have struck my <S%H3709>hand<s%> at your dishonest <S%H1215>gain<s%> which you have <S%H6213>made,<s%> and at your <S%H1818>blood<s%> which has been in the midst of <S%H8432>you.<s%>

Can your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5975>endure,<s%> or can your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H3068>you?<s%> I, Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> and will do it.

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> you through the <S%H776>countries;<s%> and I will <S%H8552>consume<s%> your filthiness out of <S%H2932>you.<s%>
You shall be <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in <S%H5869>yourself,<s%> in the sight of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has become <S%H5509>dross<s%> to <S%H5178>me:<s%> all of them are brass and <S%H913>tin<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace;<s%> they are the <S%H5509>dross<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have all become <S%H5509>dross,<s%> <S%H6908>therefore,<s%> behold, I will gather you into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

As they <S%H6910>gather<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> and <S%H913>tin<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> to <S%H5301>blow<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H5413>it,<s%> to melt <S%H6908>it;<s%> so will I gather you in my <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and I will <S%H3240>lay<s%> you <S%H5413>there,<s%> and melt you.
<S%H3664>Yes,<s%> I will gather <S%H5301>you,<s%> and blow on you with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

As <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2046>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> so you will be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my wrath on <S%H2534>you.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H776>her,<s%> You are a land that is not <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> nor <S%H1656>rained<s%> on in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

There is a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> like a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey:<s%> they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H5315>souls;<s%> they <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2633>treasure<s%> and precious <S%H3366>things;<s%> they have made her <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to my <S%H8451>law,<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> they have made no <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>common,<s%> neither have they caused men to <S%H3045>discern<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and have <S%H5956>hidden<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and I am <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in its <S%H7130>midst<s%> are like <S%H2061>wolves<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5315>souls,<s%> that they may <S%H1214>get<s%> dishonest <S%H1215>gain.<s%>

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2902>plastered<s%> for them with <S%H8602>whitewash,<s%> <S%H2374>seeing<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>visions,<s%> and divining <S%H3577>lies<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have used <S%H6231>oppression,<s%> and <S%H1497>exercised<s%> <S%H1498>robbery;<s%> <S%H3238>yes,<s%> they have troubled the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> and have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> <S%H4941>wrongfully.<s%>

I <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> among <S%H1443>them,<s%> who should build up the <S%H1447>wall,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6556>gap<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for the <S%H776>land,<s%> that I should not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4672>it;<s%> but I found none.

Therefore have I poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on <S%H3615>them;<s%> I have consumed them with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> their own <S%H1870>way<s%> have I <S%H5414>brought<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
